headline: Spin-Off Plan and Weaker Guidance Might Change the Case for Investing in Kraft Heinz (KHC)
summary: In the past week, Kraft Heinz reported mixed third-quarter results, lowered its full-year guidance, and announced plans to spin off into two independent companies by the second half of 2026, while also unveiling collaborations and product launches such as a partnership with Herschel Supply and a limited-time Apple Pie flavored Kraft Mac & Cheese. This combination of operational challenges, updated financial outlook, and a significant company restructuring signals both uncertainty and a shift...
